member.name: T:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.AlphaVantageConfiguration
member.summary: Implements and houses configuration parameters to correctly connect to and communicate with Alpha Vantage's services.

member.name: P:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.AlphaVantageConfiguration.MaxCallsPerDay
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of calls allowed per day.

member.name: P:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.AlphaVantageConfiguration.SymbolSearchUrl
member.summary: Gets the fully-qualified URL to use to search for symbols, including the API key. However, omits the actual search symbol.

member.summary: Constructs a new using given parameters.
member.param: The max. number of calls per day before API calls become rate limited by Alpha Vantage.

The fully-qualified URL to use to search for symbols, including the API key. However, omit the actual search symbol.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.AlphaVantageConfiguration.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new using all-default settings.
member.param: The API key (to be requested via Alpha Vantage's website prior to using this library).

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.DTO.QueryResponse.GetFirstOfDefaultAbsoluteMatch
member.summary: Returns, if exists, a DTO containing the first result that is a 100% match. Returns NULL when no 100% match exists, or no results are returned.

member.name: T:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.Interfaces.IAlphaVantageDataProvider
member.summary: Defines a blueprint for a data provider that connects to and can call Alpha Vantage APIs.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.Interfaces.IAlphaVantageDataProvider.Configure(BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.AlphaVantageConfiguration)
member.summary: Configures this so that it can successfully communicate with the Alpha Vantage APIs.
member.param: The to configure this with.
member.remarks: Configuration is required before any APIs can be called.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.Interfaces.IAlphaVantageDataProvider.GetBaseCompanyDataFullyMatching(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets base company data for a given symbol that EXACTLY matches a query. Returns, if exists, a DTO containing the first result that is a 100% match. Returns NULL when no 100% match exists, or when no results were returned from the API.
member.param: The symbol to return data for.
Set to TRUE to retry the request, in case the initial request should prove unsuccessful.
The number of minutes to wait before automatically retrying re-sending the request, if the intention is to retry again upon error.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.AlphaVantage.Interfaces.IAlphaVantageDataProvider.GetBaseCompanyDataPartialMatches(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets base company data DTO that matches a query either completely, or to a certain extent only.
member.param: The symbol to return data for.
Set to TRUE to retry the request, in case the initial request should prove unsuccessful.
The number of minutes to wait before automatically retrying re-sending the request, if the intention is to retry again upon error.
